summary.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.

span.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此权限来控制加密数据和内存使用的功能和类。This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通过两个权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含的操作中指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission. 权限访问权限是有关权限的子集访问。For example, a permission for access is a subset of a permission for access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示所有操作，表示由当前权限和指定的权限的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
